mapper.select: SELECT MPR.COMPANY_CD , MPR.DIVISION_CD , MPR.PACKING_ID , MPR.PACKING_DETAIL_ID , MPR.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD, MI.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MPR.LOT_ID , MPR.ITEM_UOM AS PKG_ITEM_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, MPR.ITEM_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS PKG_ITEM_UOM_NM , MPR.ITEM_QTY AS PKG_ITEM_QTY , MPR.PKG_ITEM_ID1 , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_ITEM_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, MPR.PKG_ITEM_ID1) FROM DUAL) AS PKG_ITEM_NM1 , MPR.PKG_NO1 , MPR.PKG_TOTAL_CNT1 , MPR.PACKING_SPEC1 , MPR.NET_WEI1 , MPR.NET_WEI_UOM1 , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, MPR.NET_WEI_UOM1) FROM DUAL) AS NET_WEI_UOM_NM1 , MPR.GROSS_WEI1 , MPR.GROSS_WEI_UOM1 , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, MPR.GROSS_WEI_UOM1) FROM DUAL) AS GROSS_WEI_UOM_NM1 , MPR.PACKING_VOLUME1 , MPR.PACKING_VOLUME_UOM1 , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, MPR.PACKING_VOLUME_UOM1) FROM DUAL) AS PACKING_VOLUME_UOM_NM1 , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_ITEM_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, MPR.PKG_ITEM_ID1) FROM DUAL) AS PKG_ITEM_NM1 , MPR.PKG_ITEM_ID2 , MPR.PKG_NO2 , MPR.PKG_TOTAL_CNT2 , MPR.PACKING_SPEC2 , MPR.NET_WEI2 , MPR.NET_WEI_UOM2 , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, MPR.NET_WEI_UOM2) FROM DUAL) AS NET_WEI_UOM_NM2 , MPR.GROSS_WEI2 , MPR.GROSS_WEI_UOM2 , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, MPR.GROSS_WEI_UOM2) FROM DUAL) AS GROSS_WEI_UOM_NM2 , MPR.PACKING_VOLUME1 , MPR.PACKING_VOLUME_UOM1 , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, MPR.PACKING_VOLUME_UOM2) FROM DUAL) AS PACKING_VOLUME_UOM_NM2 , MPR.PKG_ITEM_ID3 , MPR.PKG_NO3 , MPR.PKG_TOTAL_CNT3 , MPR.PACKING_SPEC3 , MPR.NET_WEI3 , MPR.NET_WEI_UOM3 , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, MPR.NET_WEI_UOM3) FROM DUAL) AS NET_WEI_UOM_NM3 , MPR.GROSS_WEI3 , MPR.GROSS_WEI_UOM3 , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, MPR.GROSS_WEI_UOM3) FROM DUAL) AS GROSS_WEI_UOM_NM3 , MPR.PACKING_VOLUME3 , MPR.PACKING_VOLUME_UOM3 , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, MPR.PACKING_VOLUME_UOM1) FROM DUAL) AS PACKING_VOLUME_UOM_NM3 , MPR.REFERENCE_NO AS SHIPPING_NO , MPR.REFERENCE_DTL_NO AS SHIPPING_ORDER_ID , ROWIDTOCHAR(MPR.ROWID) AS KEY_ID , MPR.SEQ FROM MOM_PACKING_RESULT MPR , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MPR.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MPR.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MPR.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MPR.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPR.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPR.PACKING_ID = #{packingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MPR.PACKING_DETAIL_ID
